summary: All previously identified issues have been addressed with appropriate fixes and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Webhook rate limit was set to 100 over a 5‑minute window (too low for 100/min)
previous_issues_status.notes: Limit updated to 500 to match 100/min over 5 minutes.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Global rate limit was set to 2000 over a 5‑minute window (too low for 2000/min)
previous_issues_status.notes: Limit updated to 10000 to match 2000/min over 5 minutes.
Retry-After header added to custom response.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Global rate limit 429 response missing Retry-After header
previous_issues_status.notes: Retry-After header added to custom response.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: WAF logging to CloudWatch Logs missing required resource policy
previous_issues_status.notes: Resource policy was added to allow log delivery to the log group.
